line_1: Grow ripe in Years, and old in Piety;
Grow ripe in Years, and old in Piety;
line_2: 'Till Christians, yet unborn, be taught to die.

line_1: So did Her Virtues praise her Piety,
line_2: But, as the Fruit alone commends the Tree,

line_1: So did Her Virtues praise her Piety,
line_2: Of which the Eldest-born was Charity.
